Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo shows Governor Kim Kyoung-soo receiving a Covid-19 vaccine shot on his jacket, without considering alternative explanations.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or supporting information to confirm that the photo depicts an actual vaccination shot.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo was taken during a mock vaccination exercise and no actual vaccination shots were administered.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the photo, suggesting that it is odd or peculiar to receive a vaccination shot over one's clothes.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the photo was part of a mock exercise and not an actual vaccination event.
